comments:
When I double click some entry for an xml file in the SVN history view of a project (for instance some pom.xml file) Eclipse tries to open a org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor and fails with a NPE like this:

I suspect that bug 181384 should have been marked as a duplicate to this one.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 181384 ***
